column1: # File specifying when to use the various ALE/GAGE/AGAGE instruments
# Instrument can be one of ALE/GAGE/GCMD/GCMS-ADS/GCMS-Medusa
# A blank entry means that the time is unbounded at that end
# If there is no entry for a species it is assumed that it is only measured on the GCMS-Medusa
# Time periods can overlap if you want to keep both instruments
# Date format should be YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM
# NOTE: IF WORKING IN EXCEL CONVERT DATE COLUMNS TO TEXT OTHERWISE EXCEL WILL APPLY ITS OWN CONVERSION
